title: Fuga da Sobibor
description:
Fuga Da Sobibor (Escape From Sobibor)
Cast: Alan Arkin, Joanna Pacula, Rutger Hauer, Hartmut Becker, Jack Shepherd, Emil Wolk, Simon Gregor, Hugo Bower, Robert Gwilym

Trama
